thread.title: Karim Benzema offered to Arsenal and Chelsea? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
thread.title_full: Karim Benzema offered to Arsenal and Chelsea? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Karim Benzema offered to Arsenal and Chelsea? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers
text:
Sport Karim Benzema offered to Arsenal and Chelsea? Transfer news and gossip from Monday's papers PLUS: Leonardo Ulloa targeted by Premier League strugglers while Leeds could be set to land a new striker Share Benzema was subbed off during the 3-0 win against Real Sociedad (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get football   Could   
Premier League duo Arsenal and Chelsea have reportedly been offered Real Madrid striker Karim Benzema. 
The France striker has had an uninspiring season at the Bernabeu this year and has been booed by his own fans on occasion. 
And Spanish outlet Diario Gol claims that the club have offered the 29-year-old to the London rivals Chelsea and Arsenal. 
Paris Saint-Germain are also in for Benzema, whose time in Madrid is set to come to an end. Transfer news and gossip from the Daily Mirror 
Chelsea goalkeeper Asmir Begovic confirms exit desire as he admits: I'm wasted on the bench. Begovic wants first-team football (Photo: 2017 Getty Images) 
Stoke forward Bojan joins Bundesliga side Mainz on loan until end of season. 
Swansea chief Paul Clement wants Benfica defender Lisandro Lopez in bid to shore up leaky defence. 
West Brom trying to hijack Chelsea defender Branislav Ivanovic's proposed move to Zenit St Petersburg. The Baggies want the Chelsea full-back (Photo: Ian Walton) 
Philippe Coutinho STILL convinced he can lead Liverpool to honours . 
Manchester City skipper Vincent Kompany says he may have "1001" scars, but he'll never be broken. 
Arsene Wenger fires back at ban critics : “Those who don’t like me, any sentence will be too lenient”. 
Sutton boss Paul Doswell eyes "unbelievable" home tie against Premier League elite in FA Cup fifth round. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
